name: Quick Apple Cobbler
author: Tammy
summary: This is a very easy recipe made with simple basics you usually have around the house. Perfect with after-dinner coffee or office pot-lucks. My sons also like to top it with whipped cream or ice cream. Change it up a bit by substituting a can of cherries or sliced peaches for a different variety of cobbler.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Pour butter into 9-inch round baking pan
Mix 1 cup sugar, flour, and baking powder together in a bowl
Pour batter into the baking pan
Arrange apples over the batter; sprinkle remaining 1/4 cup sugar and cinnamon on top
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 45 minutes
